attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the age of 16 a person can leave school, get married, join the armed forces and pay tax all things that require responsible and mature choices. Yet why can they not vote for the Parliament and Government which decides educational, fiscal and military policy?  This petition wants this unfair situation reversed with 16 year olds given the franchise and a real say in their society.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "lower the voting age to 16."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20115


Prime Minister's Office
